name: 0 Escape
description:
Try to escape without getting caught !

This game has been made for the Casio Graph 35+ it may require some modifications to be played on other calculators. You can also play it on windows using the emulator found here.

This game is an entry for the 1KBCJ#5 game jam you can find the original submission in French here.

Controls :

Use the arrows to move

(EXE) to step the time without moving

(SHIFT) to pause

(EXIT) to quit

Gameplay :

Time steps only when you move (or choose to stay in place)

If you touch an enemy or an enemy sees you you instantly loose.

Try to reach the right of the level to complete it, good luck !

More details :

The up and down sides of the screen are linked, you and enemies can loop back through it.

Ennemies see in a 3 units sided square centered right in front of them, like in the picture below :

They don't see through the bottom or top of the screen, take advantage of that to clear the levels !
